subproject.description:
Support for Strengthening of Parliamentary Democracy in Bhutan. Support to Bhutan Centre for Media and Democracy (BCMD) for media, democracy and civic education.

 - Enhanced public awareness on gender, inclusive democratic governance, rights and duties through civic education.
subproject.title: Support Bhutan Centre forMedia

subproject.corporate outcome: Legislatures, regional elected bodies, and local assemblies have strengthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively

title: Support to Bhutan Centre for Media and Democracy (BCMD)
